message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $925,000 would be fair. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposal.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $880,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I hope this proposal meets your needs.
